channel.title: HAMACHI BUKKIT SERVER! [Survival/creative] mcMMO pvp
channel.description: I have an hamachi survival bukkit server 1.2.5 with 3 spots out of 5 left to be taken! If you have not already, Download Hamachi it will not affect being able to join other servers as I join other servers myself and it is fully FREE to download. The link to hamachi for your convenience is: [url=http://hamachi.en.softonic.com/download]http://hamachi.en.softonic.com/download[/url] Join an existing Network Network ID:Minecraftfunforgamers Password:nice IP: 5.147.214.125 The plugins I have are: Death Happens Easy Enchant Essentials Herobrine mcMMO Minecars Moneyshop Secure Chests Sign Shop Useful Villagers Vitals Werewolf and getting more everyday! This is only a new server and world, we are open to many suggestions but not the destruction, but pvp is fine I hope you have fun if you decide to join and if you have any questions or faults please post them and I will check the posts daily! Ive seen a couple of people look at this if you find this unappealing could you please reply why?
